oai_dc:dc.dc:description: A means of defending a dog from a Baboon, by telling him that it belongs to a young woman. (L V.-24. 5948-5956). The people deceive the baboons and the baboons act as if they were not intending to kill the dog, but merely wanted to play with it.
oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Means of defending a dog from baboons
